profile:
Water Filter Systems, Water Softeners, Reverse Osmosis, Office Water Coolers, Cottage Water Systems, Commercial Water Systems, Ultraviolet water purifiers - Sales and service since 1991. 
 
Our Service Area:   Greater Toronto Area, Toronto, North York, East York, Thornhill, Richmond Hill, Stouffville, Oakridges, Weston, Aurora, Newmarket, Markham, Scarborough, Etobicoke, Mississauga, King City, Brampton, Bolton, Alliston, Innisfil, Barrie, Uxbridge, Hamilton, Milton, Kitchener-Waterloo, Guelph, Ancaster

WE ARE THE MOST TRUSTED WATER TREATMENT COMPANY IN ONTARIO

Here’s how we do it:

- Honesty: We won’t sell you stuff you don’t need. No upselling.
- Adaptability: We keep up with evolving technologies and best business practices.
- Expertise: We have the knowledge, experience and skills required to do a thorough job every time.
- Courtesy: We respect and treat each customer as if they are family.
hours: Monday - Thursday, 9am to 6 pm. Fridays, 10am to 5pm. Saturdays, 10am to 3
products: Water softeners, Reverse osmosis systems, Water filtration systems, Whole home filtration systems, Shower filters, Cottage water filter systems, Restaurant water and coffee systems, Office water coolers sales and rental. Repair and service to all makes and models of water softeners, drinking water systems and whole home water filters.
